question:
Which of the following statements are correct?
1. Second Round Table Conference took place in 1931.
2. Karachi session of India National Congress was headed by Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel.
3. Bhagat Singh was executed in 1931.
4. Gandhi-Irwin Pact was signed on 5th March, 1931.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Second Round Table Conference took place in 1931. Karachi session of India National Congress was headed by Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel. Bhagat Singh was executed in 1931. Gandhi-Irwin Pact was signed on 5th March, 1931.
